item.title: Tmux: The Ultimate Terminal Multiplexer Guide
item.author: kytedance@gmail.com (kyden)
item.description:
导语
Tmux (Terminal Multiplexer) is an essential tool in modern development environments that revolutionizes how we interact with terminal sessions. This powerful utility allows you to create persistent sessions, manage multiple windows, and split panes within a single terminal window. Whether you’re developing locally, managing remote servers, or running long-term processes, Tmux enhances your terminal experience with features like session persistence, window management, and customizable workflows. This guide will walk you through everything from basic commands to advanced configurations, helping you build a more efficient and organized terminal workspace.
